__comment__: This file was automatically created by mcresources
name: Stainless Steel

pages.text: $(thing)Stainless Steel$() and $(thing)Chromium$() are $(thing)Steel-tier$() metals added by Firmalife. They are used in the construction of $(l:firmalife:firmalife/greenhouse)Stainless Steel Greenhouses$().
Chromite is an ore that is melted to obtain Chromium. It is found in $(thing)Igneous Intrusive$() and $(thing)Metamorphic$() rocks.
